items.name: static let fade: CATransitionType
items.desc: The layer’s content fades as it becomes visible or hidden.

items.name: static let moveIn: CATransitionType
items.desc: The layer’s content slides into place over any existing content. The Common Transition Subtypes are used with this transition.

items.name: static let push: CATransitionType
items.desc: The layer’s content pushes any existing content as it slides into place. The Common Transition Subtypes are used with this transition.

items.name: static let reveal: CATransitionType
items.desc: The layer’s content is revealed gradually in the direction specified by the transition subtype. The Common Transition Subtypes are used with this transition.
